alert.note: Alert for Newberry (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 06 at 3:40PM EDT by NWS Columbia
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of eastern Newberry County through 415 PM EDT... At 340 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Prosperity, or near Newberry. This storm was nearly stationary. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Newberry, Prosperity, Newberry College, Little Mountain, Pomaria, Peak, US-176 and SC-34 Crossroads and Mid-Carolina High School. This includes Interstate 26 between mile markers 73 and 87. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
